experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Accord Global Technology Solutions
workDescription: - Developed and maintained front-end components using React, ensuring a responsive and user-friendly interface.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features, enhancing overall product functionality.
- Optimized performance by identifying bottlenecks and implementing solutions, resulting in a significant 50% speed improvement.
- Ensured code quality through thorough testing and code reviews, contributing to a stable and reliable application.
- Stayed updated with industry trends and best practices, integrating modern techniques to continuously improve the application's architecture.
